snp5.16:1.3: “but you haven’t answered me, O Seer.
snp5.16:1.4: I have heard that the divine hermit
snp5.16:1.5: answers when questioned a third time.
snp5.16:2.1: Regarding this world, the other world,
snp5.16:2.2: and the realm of Brahmā with its gods,
snp5.16:2.3: I’m not familiar with the view
snp5.16:3.1: So I’ve come in need with a question
snp5.16:3.2: to the one of excellent vision.
snp5.16:3.3: How should one look upon the world
